channel.title: Pages on Nagendra Posani
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Nagendra Posani

item.title: Projects
item.description: Now a days everyone wants to learn to code and slowly it has become an indispensable skill. According to me, learning new languages isn’t enough, we have to be comfortable with the technologies and be able to work with it. The rapid evolution of technology forces us to constantly reconsider which skills are in demand. Learning new technologies or being up to date with what we already know is very important.
